description:
A timer for anything imaginable!  Interval Alerter is a very simple and expansive countdown timer for webOS.  Have a strict 5 minute presentation to give?  Interval Timer can have your phone vibrate every minute to keep your presentation discretely on pace.  Need to be reminded to flip the food on the grill every 3 minutes?  

Interval Timer can alert you at any given time quickly and easily.  Switch between vibrate, sounds, or both, even in the middle of an active timer.

Can be used for presentations, cooking, working out, games, and almost anything else a timer would be needed for.

Interval Alerter features an advanced setup mode with numerous tools to configure whatever type of timer you may need.  Complete with custom sounds, save/load capability, ability to assign notes to alerts, and an alert editor to view & modify your existing alerts.  

Updates:
1.4.0-Fixes bugs, works better with webOS 2.0 devices (Pre 2)
